text_block_list.text: I waited for Seiun Sky prior to the start of training, but…
Since there was a huge racing event coming to Tracen Academy soon, the racetrack was filled with Uma Musume wanting to train.
With how crowded it is she's probably thinking "if I can't give it my all, what's the point?" And because of that she'll probably ditch

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, hello!!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Today's a great day for training, doncha think!? I'm really itching to race right now!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Woah, that's how you react when the Uma Musume you're training arrives? How depressing. I thought you'd be glad to see me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: No no, my next race is coming up soon, so I wouldn't dream of skipping out on training.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Plus I'm feeling great today! I can't just sit around, I just wanna run!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So I'm gonna do just that! Oh, by the way…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, you'll be keeping a close eye on me, won't you? I'm looking forward to being rewarded for all of my hard work after this…
Just like she said, Seiun Sky ran with great form in an aggressive manner. Then…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hey hey, got a minute?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The course is packed today, and there's not much room to run, so would you mind if I ran alongside you?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Yes, that's fine. Securing a spot on the track today's really tough, huh?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hmm, who should I train with next… Oh!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. Until a separate spot opens up, would you mind if I ran with you?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Guess that's fine. Let's go for a run then.
It's rare for Seiun Sky to show off her abilities, so seeing her call out and train with others was stunning.
Looking closely, all the girls she raced with were favored to win in the upcoming race.
Then that means… she's doing this to gather information on her rivals? If so…
choice_data_list: I know what I have to do!
I know what I have to do!

text_block_list.text: Since Seiun Sky's been putting in so much effort, I should give it my all as well.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Haa… How was today's training? Don't you think I did a great job despite how crowded it was?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Don't you think I deserve a reward for my hard work today?
choice_data_list: You did amazing, here's your reward.
You did amazing, here's your reward.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh, what's this data? Hmm…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The first girl that I raced against has a habit of getting overzealous and pushing too hard to get ahead…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The second girl I raced against seemed to struggle when she was directly behind me…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh… I get it now. You were preparing this "reward" for me while I was training.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yup, this is perfect. I knew it, you know me so well.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Thanks to this wonderful "reward", Sei-chan's bond level has increased by one. Pirorirori～n♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: If things stay like this, we might just catch something big in the upcoming race… Just kidding.
She seems happy with the data I gave her. After all, she looked back at it multiple times.
